attributes.action: For students in schools to to learn basic first aid I am 16 and had to do CPR
attributes.additional_details: Inform schools that they should make it law for students in schools to know basic first aid
attributes.background: I want the government to make school learn basic first aid as I was in Liverpool in April and had to do CPR I am 16 thankfully the ambulance operator talked me through it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
